name: graciano.me
description: meu blog vaporwave feito em jekyll

scripts.start: concurrently "webpack js/index.js -o assets/bundle.js --mode=development --watch --env=dev --progress --profile --colors" "bundle exec jekyll serve"
scripts.build:preview: webpack js/index.js -o assets/bundle.js --env=prod --progress --profile --colors && bundle exec jekyll build --drafts --future
scripts.build: webpack js/index.js -o assets/bundle.js --env=prod --progress --profile --colors && bundle exec jekyll build
